texts.Settings:Security.TokenDesc: It can be obtained after logging in to the public account of PushPlus.
texts.Settings:Security.SecretKeyDesc: It can be obtained after logging in to the public account of PushPlus.
texts.Features:MessageEnableDesc: Enable so that the application will have the ability to push messages via PushPlus.
texts.Features:Channel.WeChat.EnableDesc: Enable to allow PushPlus to push messages via the wechat official account.
texts.Features:Channel.WeChat.SendLimitDesc: Set to limit the amount of wechat channel push.
texts.Features:Channel.WeChat.SendLimitInterva: Set the limit period of wechat channel (time scale: days).
texts.Features:Channel.WeWork.EnableDesc: Enable to allow PushPlus to push messages via the enterprise wechat.
texts.Features:Channel.WeWork.SendLimitDesc: Set to limit the amount of enterprise wechat channel push.
texts.Features:Channel.WeWork.SendLimitInterva: Set the limit period of enterprise wechat channel (time scale: days).
texts.Features:Channel.Webhook.EnableDesc: Enable to allow PushPlus to push messages through third-party webhooks.
texts.Features:Channel.Webhook.SendLimitDesc: Set to limit the amount of Webhook channel push.
texts.Features:Channel.Webhook.SendLimitInterv: Set the Webhook channel limit period (time scale: days).
texts.Features:Channel.Email.EnableDesc: Enable to allow PushPlus to push messages via Email.
texts.Features:Channel.Email.SendLimitDesc: Set to limit the amount of Email channel push.
texts.Features:Channel.Email.SendLimitInterval: Set the Email channel limit period (time scale: days).
texts.Features:Channel.Sms.EnableDesc: Enable to allow PushPlus to push messages via sms.
texts.Features:Channel.Sms.SendLimitDesc: Set to limit the amount of sms channel push.
texts.Features:Channel.Sms.SendLimitIntervalDe: Set the sms channel limit period (time scale: days).
